fullText: Abrohom Naḥshirtono https://gedsh.bethmardutho.org/Abrohom-Nahshirtono http://syriaca.org/bibl/27 18 http://syriaca.org/person/110 person Maphrian of the East and author of an Anaphora. (d. 686) [ Syr. Orth. ] Maphrian of the East and author of an Anaphora. He was nicknamed naḥširtono (Ar. al-ṣayyād ) ‘the hunter’. He was consecrated as Maphrian by Athanasios II of Balad . Sources Barsoum, Scattered pearls , 333. A. Konat, Ktobo d-ṭekso d-Annafura (1986), 250–60. I. Saka, Kanīsatī al-suryāniyya (1985), 216. George A. Kiraz
title: Abrohom Naḥshirtono
